comment.language: From Ascension Day to the Feast of Pentecost, the priest adds the following paragraph.
Waktu antara Kenaikan dan Pentakosta, Imam menambah bagian:
وهذا الربع يقال من عيد الصعود إلى عيد العنصرة.

text.language: Ouoh menenca m# (h~me) n~e~hoou afsenaf e~p~swi e~niv/oui: afhemci caoui~nam m~Pefiwt n~a~gayoc: afouwrp nan m~Piparakl/ton Pip~neuma n~te ]meym/i m~v~r/] n~hanlac n~,~rwm.
And after forty days, He ascended into the heavens, was seated at the right hand of His good Father, and sent us the Paraclete, the Spirit of truth, in the likeness of tongues of fire.
Dan setelah empat puluh hari Ia Naik ke sorga dan duduk di sebelah kanan Allah yang baik, dan mengutus kepada kami Penolong, Roh Kebenaran, seperti lidah-lidah nyala api
وبعد أربعينَ يوماً صَعِدَ إلى السمواتِ، وجَلَسَ عن يمينِ أبيهِ الصالحِ، وأرسَلَ لنا المعزِّي روحَ الحقِّ مثلَ ألسنةِ نارٍ.
